channel.title: Day 5 schedule on Decision Modeling in R Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Day 5 schedule on Decision Modeling in R Workshop

item.title: Model calibration in R
item.description: Here you find all the files for the calibration session. To avoid issued with directories, we recommend storing all files in one folder. Slides Calibration.pptx Demostration CRS_CalibTargets.RData CRS_MarkovModel_Function.R CRS_Calib_NelderMead.Rmd CRS_Calib_IMIS.Rmd

item.title: Survival analysis in R
item.description: Here you find all the files for the survival analysis session. To avoid issued with directories, we recommend storing all files in one folder. Slides SurvivalAnalysisSlides.pdf Demostration data.R survival_functions.R survival_3-state_solutions.Rmd

item.title: Value of information analysis in R
item.description: Here you find all the files for the VOI session. To avoid issued with directories, we recommend storing all files in one folder. Slides VOI2.pptx Demostration PSA.csv GA_functions.R VOI_Functions.R VOI_toy.Rmd
